item.title: RNA-seq Read Alignment and Quantification
item.description: Disclaimer: This tutorial was originally written on March 26th, 2019. Introduction In this tutorial, I show you how to download raw sequence data from the European instance of the SRA, which can be accessed via https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena. At ENA, the sequencing reads are directly available in FASTQ or SRA formats, which will be explained below. For this tutorial, we need FastQC, multiQC, the SRA toolkit, the subread package, a powerful suite of tools designed to interact with SAM and BAM files called samtools, salmon, and STAR installed and referenced in the environment variable PATH.
